tweet: There you go! 👍 Finally they get it and see the potential of #IOTA!  @WeissCrypto #cryptocurrency ratings:  1. #Bitcoin 2. #Etherum 3. #IOTA 4. #Ripple 5. #Litecoin 6. #Cardano 7. #Zcash 8. #Binance 9. #Tezos 10. #Stellar   https://t.co/4kaJnCTC61  https://t.co/P3tw06OpOU

A few facts: Once #Cardano main-net is launched it will be ~100x more decentralized than #Bitcoin or ~50x more than #EOS. The throughput of Cardano could to ~1000 TPS what is ~150x more than Bitcoin. Regarding energy consumption, it is a few households vs. a small europian state.  https://t.co/LyYYmuN1Dz

Did you know the #Bitcoin network consumed more energy than the entire country of #Switzerland in July 2019? 🤔  We at #Cardano believe we need to do things differently and more efficiently!   https://t.co/igooGQDLxi #CardanoCommunity #energy #blockchain #ada #PoS #PoW

Following the successful Byron reboot, starting May 11th, we'll begin our phased transition to the Shelley mainnet via a series of Haskell testnets. From a static, federated system to a dynamic, decentralized Cardano... here's how we'll do it @Cardano  https://t.co/bqzngkmjtl  https://t.co/4fwTkB63GJ

Every now and then we see a lot of interesting #Cardano Memes come by. This is one of them!   What's your favorite #CardanoMeme? Post yours and let us know in the thread 👇!  You can also find more CardanoCommunity memes on our #CardanoForum, sign up here:  https://t.co/EeOI05hqn0  https://t.co/jJTbwcoyos

Once businesses and banks stop playing with a private version of #blockchain people will find out that they need a public network like #Cardano. Blockchain must be global and decentralized. Cardano will be champion in that.  Read about the future:  https://t.co/oqArLPcwE5  #crypto

Well, it's been another busy (aka exciting!) week. Check out our latest #Cardano development update for the lowdown on what we've been delivering w/e May 1st. Have a great weekend everybody!  https://t.co/OWi9EX9GuE  https://t.co/9UwvXG9MTx

ICYMI: Tim, Aparna and the IOHK team got together on Thursday for April's LIVE show to share what's new in #Cardano.
